channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Review Session to Discuss Programs in Analytics, Machine Learning, AI
item.description: Date: Tuesday, May 21, 2024 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for a session highlighting Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning and AI. Attendees can expect to learn how data can inform better decisions, and will review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please register to attend.
item.author: Community

item.title: Webex Education Connector to Automatically Migrate to Webex LTI Legacy June 2
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the Rensselaer community that the Webex Education Connector used to connect Webex and Blackboard will be automatically migrated to Webex LTI Legacy on Sunday, June 2, 2024. Please refer to the “Authorization Error in LMS Webex Education Connector” ITSSC article for more information if you need to reauthorize the connection.
item.author: Community

item.title: Check Out the “Center of Gravity” on May 22!
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, May 22, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - The Center of Gravity is your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success this summer! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to visit weekly!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
